KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Residency
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Indicates there is a discrepancy or incomplete information to establish residency status

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Unpaid fees
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Indicates that this issue has to do with fees that were incurred but never paid

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Access Grades
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Restricts students access to her grades

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Add Charges Restriction
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Cannot submit new charges to the student's account

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Bursar Refund
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Stops a student from receiving a refund even if they have a creadit balance

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Dorm Access Restriction
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student barred from access to the dorm

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Receive Diploma Restriction
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Cannot get physical diploma (don't mail or allow to be picked up

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Status
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Student is not allowed to register, be on campus, or use any campus facilities or resources

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Update Program
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Blocks a student from changing her degree program

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Verification
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Blocks a student from having a request to verify her attendance or degrees processed

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Instructor Hold
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This is a hold that applies to instructors

KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.NAME: Student Hold
KSEN_HOLD_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This is a hold that applies to students
